title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: The Prosecuting Attorney, SCOTT, is standing before a jury.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Ladies and gentleman, before you today sits a murderer. On the night in question, this monster entered the home of Dr. Jeffrey O'Dwyer and struck him repeatedly in the head with this hammer.

role: The Prosecutor holds up a hammer. It has blood and hair all
text: over it.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: He points to the defense table where Terrance sits and shrugs
text: nonchalantly and then lifts his ass cheek to fart. His defense attorney, Phillip, laughs.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Oh, Terrance, you've farted in court.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Yes, Phillip, I'm making a case for our defense!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: The Prosecutor continues, pacing in front of the jury. He
text: has before him an endless table of physical evidence.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: He holds up the fabric. Terrance casually covers the rip on
text: his sleeve and smiles at the jury.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: The prosecutor holds up the dayplanner page. It has a skull
text: and crossbones and says, "Kill Dr. Jeffrey O'Dwyer 7:30. Dinner with the McCullough's 8:15."

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: ...a haiku called Time To Kill Dr. Jeffrey O'Dwyer (counting the syllables on his hand as he reads) "Doctor O'Dwyer, Time to have your head smashed in, with my new hammer."

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Terrance, you may be a famous surgeon but you're not God! Do you think you're God?! J'accuse, Terrance!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: With a big dramatic fingerpoint, we pan quickly over to
text: Terrance. He smiles at the jury, then farts.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Would you like a monkey claw, Phillip?

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

text: fart.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: That's called the monkey claw because it feels like my colon is being ripped apart by a thousand monkeys!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: The monkey claw is smelly!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: Terrance laughs. The OLD BLACK FEMALE JUDGE smacks her gavel
text: and speaks in a slow, drowsy southern-Canadian drawl like a hillbilly bear.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Come on, get a move on. I ain't gettin' any younger up here.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: I have, haven't I, Terrance?

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: He farts again. The jurors start to smile.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Your honor, the defense is trying to make a mockery of this court! They think that farts are funny!! But they're not!!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Sustained.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Good people of the jury. My client, Terrance, is no more a murderer than you or me. He loves puppies and hates mean things.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: He shows a picture of Terrance giving a carrot to a llama.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

text: Ha, ha! Just kidding!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: God dammit! That isn't funny!!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: You're gonna have to repeat that verdict because we had some flatulence issues.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Oh, HA HA HA!!!

text: lot. We can see the big, Canadian flag behind them. Lots of REPORTERS and PROTESTERS are gathered out front.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: That sure was fun Phillip, let's go home and eat Kraft Dinner!

text: Here, here!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

text: Wow! Scott really hates us, Phillip.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: We're not?

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Well, let us board the subway and return home. There we can eat Kraft dinner.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Yes, It's been a long day. And only Kraft dinner can calm my nerves.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

text: God only knows.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: The subway certainly is wonderful Terrance.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: It sure is. Let's look for treasure.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Yes, let's look for treasure.

text: assedly turning over seat covers.

text: Hello?

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

text: No, you never did, Terrance.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Oh. Well, it all began fifteen years ago...

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: My God! What a fascinating story, Terrance! Especially the part aboot Celine Dion.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Oh, Phillip, how will I ever find my fugitive daughter in this daunting place? We don't speak the language, we are unwelcome strangers, and we have no idea where to begin!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Oh look, there she is.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: In the midst of Iranian people, little Sally, who is white,
text: stands out like a sore thumb.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Oh, good.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Who? Where?

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: I'm here, Sally. It's your father, Terrance. I'm here to save you from your smelly Iranian captors.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Papa!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Say, she looks a lot more like Celine Dion than you, Terrance.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: Sally rips a fart and laughs.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: OH, NOW I SEE THE RESEMBLANCE!!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Well, enough of Iran, let's get home.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: We see the plane heading back the other way.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Well, now that I have my bastard daughter back, I feel like going back to Celine Dion's house and asking her to marry me again.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Oh Raspberries, looks like I'm losing a friend.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: No, you're gaining a pop vocalist.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: OH MY GOD, WHAT IS THIS?!?!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: Terrance and Phillip look around, and see that Canada has
text: completely changed.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: Most everything has been colored red, and large paintings of
text: Saddam Hussein hang everywhere.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Is this Canada?

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: Terrance and Phillip walk down a Canadian street, where most
text: of the buildings have been painted red. Huge framed pictures of Saddam are everywhere.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: What's going on, Terrance? How could Canada have changed so much whilst we were gone?

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: I don't know, Terrance. And who is that smelly person in all these pictures?

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: I must take my bastard daughter back to Celine Dion, and she what she has to say.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: Terrance and Phillip walk up to Celine's door and knock.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Celine, I've brought our daughter Sally back. And I want to tell you that --

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Terrance... Uh... Could you come back a little later?

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Why?

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Uh... I'm just a little busy right now...

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: You've got a MAN over, don't you Celine Dion!!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Well, I --

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: Ugly Bob walks up to the door. The brown paper bag is still
text: on his head.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Hi guys.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Oh my God! It's Ugly Bob!!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: I'm doing Celine Dion, what's it look like?

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Oh Celine Dion, what have you done?! I was going to make us a family again but now you've slept with ugly Bob!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: What do you mean? Why are you calling him 'Ugly Bob'?

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Because that's his name, you stupid bitch!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Look at him, Celine Dion!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: AAAAAAAAAAAAAAGHGHHH!!!!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: Saddam is sitting at his desk. Scott walks in.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Hey Saddam, you helped me get rid of Terrance and Phillip, and I appreciate that... But why are framed pictures of you going up all over Canada?

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Huh? Oh, that. Don't worry guy, you just need a rest.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: No I don't need a rest! I want to know what this is all aboot!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Hey, relax fella, I'm just making it so that Terrance and Phillip can never come back to Canada again. I just need a couple of things, and then I'm gonna head back to Iran.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: I thought you were from Iraq.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: A huge, Iraqi army marches past Terrance and Phillip.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: Terrance farts, and they laugh merrily.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Phillip, I'm convinced that something very very not good is happening to Canada.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Yes, I agree whole fartledly.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Hey! What the hell are you guys doing here?

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Oh, hello Scott.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Hey Scott, guess what?

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Ah! I hate you more you more than ever Terrance and Phillip! I absolutely abhor you both!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: What are you doing, Scott?

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: I'm wishing cancer upon you.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Cancer?

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: Some American Generals come in (*NOTE - Since the generals

text: Mr. Hussein, the U.S. government is becoming worried.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

text: And in other news, it appears that Saddam Hussein has finally signed an agreement to let the US inspect his military operations. When asked if he would uphold his side of the agreement, Hussein replied, quote 'Hey, relax fella, you need a rest, guy'.

text: YOU'RE a dick.

text: YOU'RE a dick.

text: YOU'RE a dick.

text: YOU'RE a dick.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: YOU'RE a dick.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: We're looking for treasure!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Listen, I have an inside scoop. There's an Iraqi dictator who is quietly and slowly taking over Canada.

text: Yes, you mean Saddam Smelly. We saw him on the tele.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

text: What do you mean?

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: You mean WE are to blame?!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: That's right, and now you must make amends. Tomorrow Saddam will try to finalize his takeover of Canada at the Roughriders/Roughriders football game. All his soldiers will be there. It will be your only shot at wiping them all out. Here, take this.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: For Canada, Terrance.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: For Canada, Phillip.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: Celine walks up to the mic and starts to sing.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: (sadly) Shtood makalek svtdot inka inka broost...

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: MUSIC starts. A guard puts the tip of his gun in Celine's
text: back and makes her take the stage.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Now, Phillip?

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Now, Terrance!!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: Terrance and Phillip pull out gas masks. Terrance put a mighty
text: Canadian Horn to his lips.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: Terrance blows the horn. Brrr ba ba BRRR!!!!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: Suddenly, every audience member in the stadium puts on a gas
text: mask.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: What the hell is this?

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: (still singing) barak a shtood, kalak a shtood...

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: Now all the audience members, with their gas masks, bend
text: over and point their asses at the field.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: With one mighty ROAR all of the Canadians FART!! Blowing hot
text: noxious gas onto the Iraqis.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: (Choking) NOOOO!!!!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: They're using chemical warfare! How could they?!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: Just then Celine Dion and Ugly Bob put on their gas masks.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: They fart along with everyone else. Until the entire stadium
text: is one big smelly dust cloud.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: Terrance and Phillip, meanwhile, are laughing their asses
text: off at all the farts.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: Finally all the dust settles, the air clears, and we see
text: that all the Iraqis lie dead or near death on the field.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: All the Canadians remove their gas masks and celebrate by
text: cheering and jumping up and down.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: WE DID IT, PHILLIP! WE'VE DESTROYED THE TURKS!!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: OH GLORIOUS DAY!!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: Everybody happily takes to the field.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: Terrance and Celine Dion embrace. 'Don't you forget about
text: me' from the Breakfast Club starts to play.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Terrance! Terrance! You've saved Canada!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Oh, it was all Phillip's idea!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: God bless you, Phillip.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Don't touch me, ugly Bob.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: What the hell happened! You were supposed to be blown up!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: We came up with a better plan. You see Scott, after all your criticism it was farting that saved Canada!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Oh! That is SO JUVENILE!!!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Hey Scott, do you like apples?

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Of course.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: Terrance farts a huge wet one of Scott's head.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: How do you like THEM apples?!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: I HATE YOU TERRANCE AND PHILLIP!!!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: Oh, Celine Dion... You never finished that National Anthem.

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: You're right Terrance, You're right...

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
role: Celine steps up to the mic and sings:

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: OH CANADA! OUR HOME AND NATIVE LAND! TRUE PATRIOT LOVE IN ALL OUR SONS COMMAND!!

title: Terrance   Phillip in  Not Without My Anus
text: WITH GLOWING HEARTS WE SEE THE RISE OUR TRUE LOVE STRONG AND FREE. WITH GLOWING HEARTS OH CANADA WE STAND ON GUARD FOR THE. GOD KEEP OUR LAND GLORIOUS AND FREE OH CANADA WE STAND ON GUARD FOR THEE. OH CANADA WE STAND ON GUARD FOR THEE.
